content:
# The error indicates that I cannot craft the transport belts directly because they require a specific crafting or smelting machine, which I have not set up. This is a common oversight when trying to craft items that need a machine instead of being able to craft them directly from the inventory.
# 
# To craft transport belts, I need to use an assembly machine. Since I don't have one in my inventory, I will need to craft an assembly machine first.

# Let's ensure I have the materials to craft an assembly machine. I will check my inventory for the required components:
# - 1 iron gear wheel
# - 1 iron plate
# - 1 electronic circuit

# I already have enough iron gear wheels and plates, but I need to check if I have electronic circuits. 

# Checking my inventory for electronic circuits.
inventory = inspect_inventory()
print(f"Current Inventory: {inventory}")  # Displaying current inventory to check for electronic circuits.

# If I have the electronic circuits, I will proceed to craft an assembly machine. If not, I will need to craft those first.
